mapper.select: SELECT no AS userNo , id AS userId , pwd AS userPwd , name AS userName , nickname AS userNickName , gender AS userGender , birth AS userBirth , phone AS userPhone , address AS userAddress , reportCnt , profileImg AS profileImgNum , starScore , socialKind , chatNtfct , cmntsNtfct , interstNtfct , outYn FROM user_info

SELECT prodNo -- 상품번호 , prodName -- 상품명 , prodPrice -- 가격 , reportCnt -- 신고횟수 , tradState -- 상태값 , CASE WHEN tradState = 0 THEN '판매중' WHEN tradState = 1 THEN '사는중' WHEN tradState = 2 THEN '거래중' WHEN tradState = 3 THEN '거래완료' END AS tradeStateResult , viewCnt -- 조회수 , tradeKind -- 거래구분 , IF(tradeKind = 0, '팔래요', '살래요') AS tradeKindResult , address -- 주소 , ( SELECT COUNT(interestNo) FROM interest_info inst_info WHERE inst_info.prodNo = prod_info.prodNo ) AS likeCnt -- 좋아요 갯수 , f.uploadFileName , f.dbFileName FROM product_info prod_info LEFT JOIN file f ON f.no = prod_info.prodNo AND f.gubun = 2 AND f.fileOrder = 0 WHERE delYn != 'Y' AND prodNo IN ( SELECT prodNo FROM interest_info inst_info WHERE userNo IN ( SELECT no FROM user_info WHERE id = #{userId} AND pwd = #{userPwd} ) )

SELECT prodNo , prodName , prodPrice , reportCnt , tradState , CASE WHEN tradState = 0 THEN '판매중' WHEN tradState = 1 THEN '사는중' WHEN tradState = 2 THEN '거래중' WHEN tradState = 3 THEN '거래완료' END AS tradeStateResult , viewCnt , tradeKind , IF(tradeKind = 0, '팔래요', '살래요') AS tradeKindResult , address , ( SELECT COUNT(interestNo) FROM interest_info inter_info WHERE inter_info.prodNo = prod_info.prodNo ) AS likeCnt , f.uploadFileName , f.dbFileName FROM product_info prod_info LEFT JOIN file f ON f.no = prod_info.prodNo AND f.gubun = 2 AND f.fileOrder = 0 WHERE prod_info.delYn != 'Y' AND prod_info.tradState = 3 AND prod_info.tradeKind = 0 AND prod_info.userNo = ( SELECT no FROM user_info u_info WHERE id = #{userId} AND pwd = #{userPwd} )

SELECT prodNo , prodName , prodPrice , reportCnt , tradState , CASE WHEN tradState = 0 THEN '판매중' WHEN tradState = 1 THEN '사는중' WHEN tradState = 2 THEN '거래중' WHEN tradState = 3 THEN '거래완료' END AS tradeStateResult , viewCnt , tradeKind , IF(tradeKind = 0, '팔래요', '살래요') AS tradeKindResult , address , ( SELECT COUNT(interestNo) FROM interest_info inter_info WHERE inter_info.prodNo = prod_info.prodNo ) AS likeCnt , f.uploadFileName , f.dbFileName FROM product_info prod_info LEFT JOIN file f ON f.no = prod_info.prodNo AND f.gubun = 2 AND f.fileOrder = 0 WHERE prod_info.delYn != 'Y' AND prod_info.tradState = 3 AND prod_info.tradeKind = 1 AND prod_info.buyUserNo = ( SELECT no FROM user_info u_info WHERE id = #{userId} AND pwd = #{userPwd} )
